content: there are thousands of crochet coaster free patterns but when i started looking for one i did not find any rightful most of them very simple or too lacy so i decided to create my own pattern it is an easy and fast pattern good for experienced crocheters and beginners the last ones will learn how to triple crochet how to make a magic_ring circle and how to crochet a bobble stitch also i recorded a video with the crocheting process please check it out and subscribe to my youtube channel https //www youtube com/user/beautifulcrochets sub_confirmation=1
